001package org.biopax.validator;
002
003import org.biopax.validator.api.BaseRule;
004import org.biopax.validator.api.ValidatorUtils;
005import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;
006import org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Configurable;
007
008/**
009 * A BioPAX validation rule.
010 *
011 * @param <T> a type the rule can validate.
012 */
013@Configurable
014public abstract class AbstractRule<T> extends BaseRule<T> {
015
016  @Autowired
017  public void setUtils(ValidatorUtils utils) {
018    this.utils = utils;
019  }
020
021}
